message: Hello there! How can I help you today?
My Name is Arpita, Do you know me?
As an AI, I have no memory of past conversations and I don't know people in the real world. So, no, I don't know you, Arpita. It's nice to meet you though!
I am not good at guessing ages, and I wouldn't want to make an inaccurate guess! It's also generally considered polite not to ask someone's age.
